parameter.name: Application Path
parameter.description: Full site path where you would like to install your application (i.e., Default Web Site/Content)

parameter.name: Core DB User Name
parameter.description: User name to access you Core database

parameter.name: Core DB Password
parameter.description: Password to access you Core database

parameter.name: Master DB User Name
parameter.description: User name to access you Master database

parameter.name: Master DB Password
parameter.description: Password to access you Master database

parameter.name: Web DB User Name
parameter.description: User name to access you Web database

parameter.name: Web DB Password
parameter.description: Password to access you Web database

parameter.name: Reporting DB User Name
parameter.description: User name to access you Reporting database

parameter.name: Reporting DB Password
parameter.description: Password to access you Reporting database

parameter.name: XDB Processing Tasks DB User Name
parameter.description: User name to access you XDB Processing Tasks database

parameter.name: XDB Processing Tasks DB Password
parameter.description: Password to access you XDB Processing Tasks database

parameter.name: Core Admin Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to import the dacpac and create user in Core database

parameter.name: Master Admin Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to import the dacpac and create user in Master database

parameter.name: Web Admin Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to import the dacpac and create user in Web database

parameter.name: Reporting Admin Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to import the dacpac and create user in Reporting database

parameter.name: XDB Processing Tasks Admin Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to import the dacpac and create user in XDB Processing Tasks database

parameter.name: Master Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to connect to your Master database

parameter.name: Core Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to connect to your Core database

parameter.name: Web Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to connect to your Web database

parameter.name: Reporting Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to connect to your Reporting database

parameter.name: XDB Processing Pools Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to connect to your XDB Processing Pools database

parameter.name: XDB Processing Tasks Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to connect to your XDB Processing Tasks database

parameter.name: XDB Reference Data Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to connect to your XDB Reference Data database

parameter.name: Cloud Search Connection String
parameter.description: Sitecore Cloud Search Connection String

parameter.name: Application Insights Instrumentation Key
parameter.description: Sitecore Application Insights Instrumentation Key

parameter.name: Application Insights Role
parameter.description: Sitecore Application Insights Role

parameter.name: XConnect Collection
parameter.description: XConnect Collection

parameter.name: XConnect Collection Certificate
parameter.description: XConnect Collection Certificate

parameter.name: Allow Invalid Client Certificates
parameter.description: Allow Invalid Client Certificates
